google.title: Lingokids - Play and Learn
google.description:
THE #1 INTERACTIVE APP FOR KIDS

Lingokids is the fun, safe, educational kids learning game that toddlers and children aged 2‚Äì8 love ‚Äî and parents trust! Packed with over 3000 shows, songs, coloring games, cooking games, and interactive activities, it lets your child play, learn, and grow at their own pace. This is screen time for girls and boys you can feel good about.

5 Reasons Lingokids is guilt-free for families

Made by parents & educators
Loved by toddlers, preschoolers, and elementary school kids
kidSAFE¬Æ certified & 100% ad-free
More than 30 global awards
Over 3000 fun kids games and activities to play!

INTERACTIVE ACTIVITIES
Explore over 3000 interactive games, coloring games, and toddler-friendly challenges covering 650+ learning objectives ‚Äî all through play! Subjects include math, literacy, science, engineering, art, music, and more. Kids can move at their own pace through a curated curriculum using fun toddler games, books, videos, and songs. Perfect games for 2,3,4,5,6,7,8 year olds!

MODERN LIFE SKILLS
Play and learn with activities that build both academic and real-world strengths. From emotional regulation to robotics, empathy to coding ‚Äî Lingokids helps toddlers and children aged 2‚Äì8 prepare for modern life. Created for boys and girls, the app encourages creativity, mindfulness, collaboration, and resilience ‚Äî all through play.

PLAYLEARNING‚Ñ¢ METHOD
At Lingokids, we believe learning sticks when it‚Äôs wrapped in fun. Our Playlearning‚Ñ¢ method inspires toddlers and kids to discover the world naturally ‚Äî through play, repetition, and curiosity. From coloring and games to movement, stories, and songs, every interaction builds real skills.

FEATURED BRANDS & CHARACTERS
Your kids can now play with familiar favorites like Blippi and Pocoyo, all available inside the app. Plus, discover activities created with trusted names like NASA and Oxford University Press.

Many families may already know Lingokids from our videos on YouTube and YouTube Kids, where over 3 million subscribers enjoy our playful, educational content. Now, those same kids can keep learning through fun toddler games and interactive activities inside the app.

SUBJECTS, THEMES & LEVELS THAT GROW WITH YOUR CHILD
Reading & Literacy: Build phonics, writing, and reading confidence.

Math & Engineering: Strengthen number sense, addition, subtraction, and logical thinking.

Science & Tech: Introduce biology, chemistry, coding, robotics and NASA-powered activities.

Music & Art: Play with rhythm, sound, and creativity in music + coloring games.

Social-Emotional Learning: Practice empathy, expression, and mindfulness.

History & Geography: Spark curiosity about the world and its stories.

Physical Activity: Fun stretches, yoga, and movement songs keep toddlers engaged!

TRACK PROGRESS & FAMILY FEATURES
Use the Parents Area to view progress for up to 4 children, get learning tips, browse topics, and celebrate every milestone. Built for the whole family, so you stay part of the journey.

WHY UPGRADE TO LINGOKIDS PLUS?
Unlimited access to 3000+ toddler games, coloring games, and activities

Covers 650+ learning goals across subjects and life skills

Expert-designed lessons for boys and girls aged 2‚Äì8

Blippi, Pocoyo, NASA and Oxford University Press content

Progress reports, parent community, and up to 4 child profiles

100% ad-free, with no in-app purchases

Play online or offline ‚Äî anywhere, anytime!

Subscriptions automatically renew each month 24-hours before the end of the current period and your iTunes account will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew any time from within the app. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

Help & Support: https://help.lingokids.com/
Privacy Policy: https://lingokids.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://www.lingokids.com/tos

reviews.review: Our son of 5 years made this payment. I requested a refund but was denied. What can we do?
Not suited for any other languages, very expensive and limited trail. I removed it right away..
Comment was verwijdert, maar je kan niet spelen je moet zoizo subscriben ook al bieden ze een 7 dagen free trial aan dat is dikke zever.
It's bad u have to pay
Nah my kids ar playing it hole day so no

My kids like the games. They never watch the videos with the teachers because they think it's boring. This app doesn't really have a logical structure in the sense of really starting at te beginning and learning English step by step. 18 euros per month is way too expensive in my opinion. I'm keeping the free version because of the three games a day but I will no longer pay for it.
it is funny game het is een leuk spel
Waarom ervoor moeten betalen, betaal niet voor een computer
Het inlogen werkt niet en warom betalen?? Echt stom üò†üò†üò†
Doen alsof het gratis is maar het kost een wopping ‚Ç¨17 per MAAND!
Niet leuk je moet heel lang inloggen en daarna kan je maar 3 dingen gratis en dan alles betallen
Can't cancel the subscription, not in Google Apps also not in the Lingokids app itself!!! Whats this scam!? I AIN'T PAYING JACK SHT!! Scam people like this is really pathetic!!!!
My child smashed my phone and he thrown it away. I bought a new one. Now i dont have enough money. I got already a trial but i think i didnt reconise it.
We only have the free three games a day. But it is great so far! Stijn loves it and his younger brother Sam loves it too.
My son loves to play the games and learn english at time!

Thank you for this beautiful app! My son loves it.

I love this app. As an English teacher I know how important it is to start learning a new language at a young age. My son enjoys the games and is learning a new language at the same time. It's so fun and educational. A great app.
